text:
Hi All, Nexa is looking for HubSpot developers who are experts at creating websites based on HubSpot themes, and custom HubSpot designs (Figma, PSD, Sketch, XD).
If you are someone who has experience in developing sites with HubSpot and are well versed with HubSpot modules, Custom Module Development, HubDB modification, customizing themes using HubSpot coding and styling (JS, CSS etc.), API integrations and Complex development

Requirements:
• Min 3yr experience developing in HubSpot
• Well versed with all HubSpot modules and capable of utilizing them effectively to build websites
• An expert at customizing themes using HubSpot coding and styling
• Good knowledge of HubSpot coding / CMS / Themes and Modules
• Good knowledge of creating complex modules e.g. Calculators, multistep forms.
• Speed optimization based on HubSpot
• Integration of API’s
*This is full-time (Mon - Fri 9am - 6pm GST, fully remote role)* (edited)
To apply - send your CVs to <mailto:sumaira@digitalnexa.com|sumaira@digitalnexa.com> and <mailto:parvathy@digitalnexa.com|parvathy@digitalnexa.com>
